reviews.review:
Portal 2 is an FPS puzzle game, which continue the Portal story, but now you get the chance to get away... again, thanks to a core.

Portal 2 is a masterpiece gameplay wise. It does what Portal started, but adds new elements to play with, adds more to the story and universe and even coop mode. As a single player game, you can have tons of fun, there are good amount of secrets in it and doesn't feel boring at all (well maybe for the [spoiler] old Aperture Science part[/spoiler] but that's my opinion, also you can solve community made maps and map packs, which some of them really awesome. As a CO-OP game... well this is one of the best CO-OP experience I ever experienced. For 2011, the game looks and sounds great, controls are really easy.

The only thing I can nit pick on, is about the single and coop story mode, which you for me didn't had replay value.

But all in all, this one is an amazing game for anyone, there is no question about trying it out. For 8.2‚Ç¨, it's a steal, just go for it!

Portal 2 is a classic and probably my favorite game of all time. I can't tell you how much I've enjoyed the singleplayer after replaying it twice or looking like absolute morons playing coop. Portal 2 is a puzzle game with an interesting and unique story that kinda sits on the side with charming characters you'll love all around even if they try to kill you. My only grip with this game is that there isn't another one after it :)
B I G    M O O D

I have played it on PS3 and Steam a total of 6 times all the way through, and it's probably the most replayable game ever. It's so satisfying because it has reached a level of depth and smoothness that I don't think any other game has. This game is very psychologically correct in that way.

Valve, by your actions, namely by restricting your users from one of the largest regions of the earth the ability to fully pay for anything in your store, you deprive yourself of monetization, as well as people's trust. In all the conflicts you have shown yourself worthy, but now you have become like those who have always been a bad example for you. I don't understand what you want to achieve with this. If you want to stop the bloodshed in Ukraine, then you clearly do not need to take away one of the few good things that we have left, because no one supports the Russian government, including the Russians, but by this action you only strengthen the pro-Propaganda tales about the "evil West" and that there are only enemies around Russia. I hope that people at Valve will see this, that they can somehow influence this.

Puzzle Game 3D tipo escape room. Coop o single player (Altamente consigliato la modalit√† coop)

Siamo nei panni di due robot con una capacit√† singolare, creare portali. I giocatori possono evocare portali di due colori diversi(ogni giocatori ha una propria coppia di colori) che gli consentiranno di spostarsi all'interno del livello; con questa capacit√† i giocatori dovranno compiere una serie di azioni che li porter√† all'uscita.

Tenendo in considerazione l'anno di release del gioco, direi ambientazioni sono molto semplici ma ben fatte.

Livello di cooperazione richiesto √® crescente, da banale fino a livelli in cui affidi la tua vita all'abilit√† del compagno. Il tempo medio con cui si risolvono i vari livelli direi da 2 a 18 minuti.

Pro: Modalit√† cooperativa.
Contro: Breve, 9 ore si finisce la modalit√† cooperazione (60 livelli).

Per chi cerca giochi da fare in compagnia,ALTAMENTE CONSIGLIATO anche la modalit√† single player √® carina ma non a livello della cooperativa.
